titleStmt.title: Remarkable observations on the comet, in the year 1680 as also on the blazing-star, now seen, this present month of August, 1682.
titleStmt.author: Holwell, John, 1649-1686?

notesStmt.note: Probably by John Holwell. In the final paragraph, the author refers to "a small piece ... which I intend to intitle Catastrophe mundi," a work by Holwell also published 1682.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
